definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: prob. row of olives or vines (so Du Buhl al.; cf. NH [[שׁוּרָה]], J Aram. [[שׁוּרְתָא]] row, whence mod. Ar. 4wrh: as loan-word, cf. Vogelst:Land wirthschaft 41 f.);—pl. sf. [[שׁוּרׂתְם]] Job 24:11 (al. II. [[שׁוּר]]); Bu and Du del. sf.; here also Je 5:10 (reading ´[[שֻׁ]]:) Du Buhl Dr, her (vine-)rows, but v. II. [[שׁוּר]].
